rows.segment_description: The Family of Apps segment primarily generates revenue through selling advertising placements on its family of apps to marketers. These ads enable marketers to reach people across various marketing objectives such as generating leads or driving awareness. The segment focuses on helping people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others through its platforms.
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K text snippet and revenue items

rows.segment_description: Reality Labs is a segment designed to help people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others, including through AI glasses and web-based experiences. While the segment is distinct from Family of Apps, it is reported separately and includes revenue items specific to Reality Labs.
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K text snippet and revenue items
